sentences: Meeskonna kapten oli väga hea juht.
context: The Estonian word 'meeskonda' is the illative case of 'meeskond', which means 'team'. The illiative case indicates movement into or towards something, so 'meeskonda' specifically means 'into a team' or 'onto a team'. It's used when someone is joining or being added to a team. For example, in 'Tule meeskonda mängima!' (Come join the team to play!), it expresses inviting someone to become part of the team.
